short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you control chrome tabs using javascript from your Salesforce page or visualforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides the power to control the chrome tabs, that usually in basic javascript it's blocked, it will let you control chrome tabs including close,duplicate or reload with basic javascript in your page (for salesforce domain use only).
